div.p: This code system http://jpfhir.jp/fhir/Common/CodeSystem/JP_ProcedureCodesNurse_CS defines the following codes:

description.value: Procesureで使用する処置のコード 看護実践用語標準マスター(看護行為)

copyright.value: FHIR Japanese implementation research working group in Japan Association of Medical Informatics (JAMI)
